column5: This is a long shot but working on trip logistics for 1 or 2 guys flying into Thunder Bay from Atlanta. Our fly-in starts in Nakina, Ont. Anyone have room for the drive from Thunder Bay to Nakina on6/11 with return to Thunder Bay on either 6/19 or 6/20 ? Guys will have clothing, no gear. One fellow is large 6 4 and 350. I am also checking with outfitter. Thank You
Just rent a car for the week. Probably the simplest solution. With limited gear a smaller car might work (depending on your 6' 4" 350lb partner). Blair
I think Nakina Air Service has some flights from Thunder Bay to Nakina. Web is www.nakinaairservice.com.
Hi Dave - flying into Kayedon with Remi. We met at the dock Mayof 2013. Thanks Charlie
Sorry I don't remember you. Send me a private e [email protected]
